flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Deane will spend $1.4/liter x 10 liters = $<<1.4*10=14>>14 for the 10 liters of gas today.
The price of the gas per liter on Friday will be $1.4/liter - $0.4/liter = $<<1.4-0.4=10>>10/liter.
So, he will spend $10/liter x 25 liters = $<<10*25=250>>250 for the 25 liters of gas on Friday.
Thus, Mr. Deane will spend a total of $14 + $250 = $<<14+250=264>>264 for the 35 liters of gas.
#### 264

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.9999999999999999, not 10. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
